name: tar-gz-extractor
title: TAR.GZ Archive Extractor
content:
Overview

This application extracts files from tar.gz archives. TAR.GZ is a popular compression format on Unix/Linux systems that combines TAR archiving with GZIP compression. The extractor preserves directory structures and file attributes.

Features

  • Extract all files from tar.gz archives
  • Display archive contents before extraction
  • Calculate compression ratios and file sizes
  • No external dependencies required (uses Python stdlib)
  • Preserve directory structure and file metadata

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload the tar.gz archive from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for extracted files

Output

The application extracts all files from the tar.gz archive to the output directory, preserving the original directory structure and file attributes from within the archive.

Use Cases

  • Extract compressed Unix/Linux archives
  • Unpack software distributions
  • Process backup archives
  • Access contents of compressed project files
